channel.title: Tutorials :: Documentation for the Alchemist Simulator
channel.description: Tutorials are lessons that take the reader by the hand through a series of steps. They are meant to show a beginner that they can achieve something with Alchemist.

item.title: Quickstart
item.description: A super-fast way to get an instance of the simulator up and running.

item.title: Step-by-step tutorial
item.description: A (video) guide through the main features of the simulator, as presented at DAIS 2021

item.title: Protelis Incarnation Tutorial
item.description: Ready-to-run examples of increasing complexity with the Protelis incarnation

item.title: SAPERE Incarnation Tutorial
item.description: Ready-to-run examples of increasing complexity with the SAPERE incarnation

item.title: Scafi Incarnation Tutorial
item.description: Ready-to-run examples of increasing complexity with the Scafi incarnation
